My name is José Rafael Ferrer Paris, or JR for short. 

I am an ecologists with a very spatial (sometimes even geospatial) mindset.

I started my journey in Venezuela, have been to Germany, South Africa and Colombia and I currently live and work in [Sydney](index.qmd#category=Sydney), Australia.
